titleStmt.title: The couragious Turke, or, Amurath the First A tragedie. Written by Thomas Goffe Master of Arts, and student of Christ-Church in Oxford, and acted by the students of the same house.
titleStmt.author: Goffe, Thomas, 1591-1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B. Alsop, and T. Favvcet, for Richard Meighen,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
